member.name: P:Leadtools.Caching.CacheStatistics.ExpiredItems
member.summary: Total number of items in the cache that have expired.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Caching.CacheStatistics.Items
member.summary: Total number of items in the cache in all regions.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Caching.CacheStatistics.Regions
member.summary: Number of current regions in the cache.
member.value: The number of current regions in the cache. If this is the cache used by the LEADTOOLS Document Viewer then each region represents a document.

Optional region (sub-directory) name. If this value is **null** then all the items in the cache

member.name: M:Leadtools.Caching.ObjectCache.CreateFromConfigurations(System.IO.Stream,IDictionary<string)
member.summary: Creates a new cache object from the specified configuration stream and optional additional values.
member.param: Stream containing the configuration. This is usually a stream to an XML file or data containing configuration previously saved with SaveConfiguration. This value must not be **null**.
Dictionary of key/item values containing optional values to use. *additionalValues* override any values with the same key found in *stream*.
member.returns: The ObjectCache derived class created by this method if successful. Otherwise, **null**.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Caching.ObjectCache.CreateFromConfigurationsString(System.String,IDictionary<string)
member.summary: Creates an ObjectCache derived class from the configuration XML stored in a string.
member.param: Dictionary of key/item values containing optional values to use. *additionalValues* override any values with the same key found in *value*.
member.returns: The ObjectCache derived class created by this method if successful; Otherwise, **null**.

member.summary: Cache serialization mode

member.name: F:Leadtools.Caching.CacheSerializationMode.Binary
member.summary: Binary serialization using the native framework serialization capability.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Caching.CacheSerializationMode.Xml
member.summary: XML serialization. This mode is backward compatible between different versions of LEADTOOLS.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Caching.CacheSerializationMode.Json
member.summary: Json serialization. This mode is backward compatible between different versions of LEADTOOLS.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Caching.DefaultCacheCapabilities
member.summary: Set of features that a cache implementation provides.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Caching.DefaultCacheCapabilities.CacheRegions
member.summary: Cache implementation supports the ability to partition its storage into cache regions.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Caching.DefaultCacheCapabilities.ExternalResources
member.summary: Cache implementation supports obtaining a URI to cache items providing direct file read or write access.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Caching.DefaultCacheCapabilities.Serialization
member.summary: This is a hint to the cache users that this implementation will serialize the objects added to the cache right away.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Caching.DefaultCacheCapabilities.VirtualDirectory
member.summary: Cache implementation supports obtaining a URI to cache items providing HTTP GET access.
